data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ANTELOPE cruise from Plymouth to Placentia Bay started at 1762-06-19

Ship: Antelope (4th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Plymouth - Placentia Bay Newfoundland, 1st Observer: Thomas Greaves (Captain), 2nd Observer: George Mennell (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 50G 853BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
